basic_info.name: Skullcandy Ounce Wireless Bluetooth Speaker - IPX7 Waterproof Mini Portable Speaker with 16 Hour Battery and Ballistic Nylon Carry Strap
basic_info.short_description: Introducing the Skullcandy Ounce Wireless Bluetooth Speaker - the perfect addition to your beach essentials for vacation, summer, or any outdoor adventure! Our waterproof speaker features wireless Bluetooth 5.3 streaming, ensuring that you can enjoy high-quality sound without any wires! With a 16-hour battery life, this ultra-portable and lightweight speaker is perfect for all your outdoor needs. Our waterproof Bluetooth speaker is IPX7 certified, meaning it can withstand full immersion down to 3 feet for up to 30 minutes. So, whether you're at the beach, by the pool, or on a boat, you can enjoy your music worry-free. The downward firing passive radiator also ensures that you can enjoy deep and powerful bass, no matter where you are. The Skullcandy Ounce Wireless Bluetooth Speaker is designed with your convenience in mind. The ballistic nylon strap makes it easy to carry and take anywhere, while the USB-C input and included 3-foot C-to-A charging cable ensure that you can keep the music going for hours. The fabric mesh is engineered to maximize the pass-through of high-frequency audio waves, keeping the speaker's sound bright and crystal clear. With a transmission range of up to 33 feet, you can keep your phone in your pocket and still enjoy your music. This portable Bluetooth speaker is perfect for any occasion. Don't settle for less- order your Skullcandy Ounce Wireless Bluetooth Speaker and experience the difference for yourself!

highlights: Ultra-Portable and Lightweight - Enjoy your summer essentials without the hassle of carrying a heavy speaker. Skullcandy's mini Bluetooth speaker is ultra-portable and lightweight.
16 Hour Battery Life - With 16 hours of playtime, the Skullcandy Ounce holds enough juice to keep the party going all night long.
Crystal Clear Sound - Experience high-quality sound with the downward firing passive radiator and engineered fabric mesh that maximizes high frequency audio waves.
IPX7 Waterproof - Don't let a little rain or water ruin your fun. This weather resistant, adventure-ready powerhouse can be submerged in up to 1 meter of water for up to 30 minutes.

Nylon Carry Strap - Includes a built-in hanging strap, so it’s easy to carry, store, and to keep track of. Strap the small bluetooth speaker to your bike or your backpack to enjoy your latest playlist headed to class, out running errands, or just hanging at a friend’s place. errands, or just hanging at a friend’s place.
